This upcoming week we have a series of public lectures facilitated
by the Center For International Indigenous Affairs, and taught by
our wonderful professors here at NDHUâ€™s College of Indigenous Studies.

This is a lecture series on Indigenous knowledge organized
for our visiting Indigenous scholars from Western Sydney University,
but also open to the rest of campus and wider public.
